pages.privacy-policy: RoveCasino | Our Commitment to Your Privacy and Data Protection RoveCasino +91-976-5050041 rovecasino@gmail.com Main Rd, near Lucky Store, Desh Bandhu Ward, Gorelal Chowk, Gondia, Maharashtra 441601, India 18+ Home Our services Why are we What we offer Book Privacy Policy Information We Collect We collect information from and about you in various ways. For example, we may collect information that you provide to us directly, such as when you create an account, make a deposit, or contact our customer support team. We may also collect information automatically when you use the Services, such as your IP address, device type, and usage data. Here are some examples of the types of information we may collect: Contact Information: We may collect your name, email address, phone number, and physical address when you create an account or contact us. Payment Information: We may collect your payment card information, bank account details, and other financial information when you make a deposit or request a withdrawal. Identity Verification Information: We may collect information to verify your identity, such as your date of birth, social security number, or government-issued ID. Device Information: We may collect information about your device, such as your IP address, device type, operating system, and unique device identifiers. Usage Information: We may collect information about how you use the Services, such as the games you play, the amount of time you spend on the Services, and your preferences. Location Information: We may collect information about your location, such as your IP address or geolocation data. Information from Third Parties: We may collect information about you from third parties, such as credit bureaus, identity verification services, and marketing partners. How We Use Your Information We may use your information for various purposes, including: Providing and Improving the Services: We use your information to provide and improve the Services, such as processing your deposits and withdrawals, providing customer support, and personalizing your experience. Marketing and Advertising: We may use your information to send you marketing communications, such as newsletters, promotions, and special offers. You can opt-out of receiving marketing communications at any time by contacting us. Identity Verification and Fraud Prevention: We may use your information to verify your identity and prevent fraud, such as by checking your credit history or using device identification techniques. Compliance with Laws and Regulations: We may use your information to comply with applicable laws and regulations, such as anti-money laundering laws and tax reporting requirements. Analytics and Research: We may use your information to conduct analytics and research to improve the Services and develop new products and services. Contact Us If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy or our privacy practices, please contact us at rovecasino@gmail.com. RoveCasino © 2024 RoveCasino.
